description: Two-hour exam during the exam period covering course content including electromagnetism, special relativity, optics and quantum mechanics
Weekly pre-work (2% total) and three graded experimental reports (4%, 6%, 8%) involving experiment planning, data recording, and analysis with demonstrator feedback
Regular online quizzes (10%) with immediate feedback and two invigilated 40-minute tests (15% each) drawn from question banks covering conceptual physics and mathematical problem-solving
